metadata.name: Journey Across Time
metadata.description:
Embark on an extraordinary journey through the fabric of time as you delve into the depths of temporal exploration. Extend your arm halfway into a swirling portal, a gateway to uncharted dimensions.

The portal radiates an otherworldly glow, showcasing the vast possibilities that lie beyond. Behind you, another portal materializes, revealing a mirrored reflection of your own arm emerging from it, almost touching your own back.

Experience the intricate interconnectedness of time and the potential for self-discovery and introspection. Ponder the mysteries of time travel and the profound effects it can have on our perceptions of self and reality. 'Journey Across Time' serves as a portal into a realm of endless possibilities, inviting viewers to embark on their own thrilling odyssey through the corridors of time.

***

On permanent display at the digital part of Louvre, Paris since 2023

Size: 3508 x 4961 pixels, 300 dpi
